name: 360 Orbit
description: The camera smoothly circles all the way around the subject, creating a dynamic, immersive view. Perfect for dramatic reveals, showcasing outfits, or adding visual energy.

name: 3D Rotation
description: The subject or product spins smoothly in place, showing a full 360° view. Clean, centered, and perfect for showcasing design, fashion, or product details in a modern way.

name: Abstract
description: Unusual shapes, shifting colors, and surreal motion that break away from reality. Evokes emotion, mystery, or chaos through non-traditional, artistic visuals.

name: Action Run
description: Follows the subject in fast-paced motion, often with shaky cam and dynamic angles. Perfect for chase scenes, high-energy moments, or intense action shots.

name: Agent Reveal
description: The subject jerks or shakes their head as their face and body glitch and morph into a sharp-suited agent figure. Fast, surreal, and powerful—perfect for sudden identity shifts or secret transformations.

name: Angel Wings
description: Wings spreading open behind person shoulders.

name: Arc Left
description: The camera curves gracefully around the subject to the left, adding a sense of movement, focus, and cinematic style. Ideal for emotional build-up or visual flair.

name: Arc Right
description: The camera circles gently to the right around the subject, creating dynamic depth and flow. Perfect for adding elegance or cinematic intensity to a scene.

name: Baseball Kick
description: Captures the moment of a powerful baseball-style kick, with fast leg motion and dramatic impact. Perfect for action or stylized sports edits.

name: Basketball Dunks
description: Captures the high-energy motion of a person jumping and slamming a basketball into the hoop. Powerful, athletic, and dramatic—perfect for sports or hype edits.

name: Black Tears
description: Thick, dark liquid streams from the subject’s eyes, creating a haunting, emotional, or supernatural effect. Perfect for horror, sorrowful moments, or eerie visual storytelling.

name: Bloom Mouth
description: Person open mouth, petals or flower instead of tongue.

name: Boxing
description: Follows the quick jabs, hooks, and head movement of a boxer. Intense, up-close, and rhythmic—ideal for training montages or fight scenes.

name: Buckle Up
description: Low angle shot from beneath, as if filmed through a transparent glass floor, revealing the person’s figure and soles, creating a dynamic, voyeuristic perspective.

name: Building Explosion
description: A building erupts in a massive blast, sending debris flying. Creates a powerful moment perfect for action scenes

name: Bullet Time
description: Freezes or slows down the action while the camera moves around the subject. Creates a dramatic, cinematic effect often seen in action or sci-fi scenes.

name: Car Chasing
description: Follows fast-moving cars with dynamic camera angles to create thrilling, high-speed chase scenes. Ideal for action-packed sequences and cinematic intensity.

name: Car Explosion
description: A car bursts into flames and debris, creating a powerful, high-impact shot full of action and intensity

name: Car Grip
description: Attaches the camera to a car, capturing dynamic driving shots with smooth motion. Perfect for action scenes or showing movement from the vehicle’s perspective.

name: Catwalk
description: Tracks a confident runway walk with smooth camera motion and fashion-forward energy. Sleek and stylish, like a high-fashion show moment.

name: Clone Explosion
description: The subject instantly splits into multiple identical versions that burst outward in all directions. A bold, surreal effect perfect for showcasing speed, chaos, or supernatural duplication.

name: Crane Down
description: Gently lowers the camera from above to the subject, creating a dramatic or revealing entrance. Perfect for introductions, transitions, or emotional emphasis.

name: Crane Over The Head
description: The camera rises smoothly above the subject using a crane, revealing the surroundings or adding drama. Perfect for epic moments or scene transitions.

name: Crane Up
description: Lifts the camera smoothly upward using a crane, revealing the scene below or creating an epic rising shot. Great for transitions, reveals, or emotional build-up.

name: Crash Zoom In
description: Quickly zooms into the subject to create a dramatic, intense effect. Perfect for highlighting reactions or adding sudden focus in your video.

name: Crash Zoom Out
description: Rapidly zooms out from the subject to reveal the full scene or create a sense of surprise, urgency, or comic effect. Great for dramatic reveals.

name: Datamosh
description: A glitchy visual effect where pixels bleed, smear, and blend between frames, creating distorted transitions. Chaotic, trippy, and perfect for edgy, experimental, or digital glitch aesthetics.

name: Diamond
description: The subject’s body transforms into a sparkling, faceted diamond—hard, reflective, and radiant. A stunning visual effect perfect for showing strength, elegance, or magical metamorphosis.

name: Dirty Lens
description: Simulates a camera lens with smudges, dust, or water drops for a raw, gritty look. Great for adding realism, mood, or a behind-the-scenes feel.

name: Disintegration
description: A visual effect where the subject breaks apart into particles or dust, creating a surreal, emotional, or epic moment

name: Dolly In
description: Moves the camera smoothly toward the subject, drawing viewers closer and building focus or emotion. Ideal for intense or intimate moments.

name: Dolly Left
description: Moves the camera smoothly to the left, following or revealing the scene. Perfect for tracking shots, transitions, or adding visual interest.

name: Dolly Out
description: Pulls the camera smoothly away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Great for emotional distance, dramatic exits, or cinematic reveals.

name: Dolly Right
description: Moves the camera smoothly to the right alongside the subject or scene. Great for tracking motion, revealing space, or adding cinematic flow.

name: Dolly Zoom In
description: Moves the camera forward while zooming out, warping perspective and creating a dramatic, unsettling effect. Great for shock, realization, or tension.

name: Dolly Zoom Out
description: Moves the camera backward while zooming in, distorting perspective to heighten emotion or suspense. Perfect for dramatic reveals or intense moments.

name: Double Dolly
description: Both the camera and subject move together on dollies, keeping the subject perfectly still in frame while the background shifts. Creates a surreal, floating effect often used in music videos and dreamlike scenes.

name: Downhill POV
description: Simulates a fast, first-person ride down a slope with tight turns and bumps. Feels immersive, thrilling, and adrenaline-packed.

name: Duplicate
description: The subject splits into multiple identical copies that appear side by side or in sequence. Creates a surreal, sci-fi, or fast-motion effect—great for showing speed, confusion, or supernatural power.

name: Dutch Angle
description: Tilts the camera to create a slanted horizon, adding tension, unease, or a stylized look. Perfect for thrillers, dream sequences, or edgy vibes.

name: Earth Zoom Out
description: The camera pulls back rapidly from the subject to reveal their city, then the continent, and finally the entire Earth. Epic and cinematic—perfect for transitions, scale, or storytelling.

name: Eyes In
description: Moves the camera close to the subject’s eyes, creating an intense and emotional connection with the viewer

name: Face Punch
description: Captures the sharp, explosive moment of a punch to the face. High impact, raw energy—perfect for action, fight, or intense close-up shots.

name: Fire Breathe
description: The subject exhales a burst of flames from their mouth, lighting up the scene with intense heat and motion. Bold and fierce—perfect for fantasy, action, or supernatural power moments.

name: Fisheye
description: A wide, distorted lens look that curves the edges of the frame, making everything appear rounded and exaggerated. Adds a fun, surreal, or edgy vibe to the shot.

name: Floating Fish
description: Light blue fish swims in from outside the frame and floats gracefully around her, moving gently through the air as if drifting in invisible water.

name: Flood
description: The water is the moving force — it spreads, rises, and dominates the space.

name: Floral Eyes
description: An enchanting transformation where vibrant flowers blossom from the subject’s face, merging nature with identity.

name: Flying
description: Simulates a smooth, gliding flight through the scene, like soaring with a drone. Perfect for epic reveals, dynamic transitions, or creating a sense of freedom and flow.

name: Focus Change
description: Shifts the focus from one subject to another in the same shot, guiding the viewer’s attention. Great for storytelling, reveals, or emotional emphasis.

name: FPV Drone
description: Captures fast, fluid shots with a first-person view drone, flying through tight spaces and dynamic paths. Ideal for thrilling, immersive, and cinematic footage.

name: Freezing
description: The subject slowly turns to ice—skin frosts over, breath becomes visible, and motion stops. Cold, dramatic, and perfect for supernatural, winter, or time-stopping effects.

name: Garden Bloom
description: A lush visual effect where the entire body becomes enveloped in blooming flowers and greenery, as if nature reclaims the subject.

name: General
description: A balanced, all-purpose camera style with natural movement and clean framing. Works well for any scene, offering a neutral look without dramatic effects.

name: Glam
description: A high-speed camera moves smoothly around the subject, creating epic, slow-motion shots full of glamour and impact

name: Glowing Fish
description: Bioluminescent fish swim gracefully around the subject, casting soft, radiant light. Dreamlike, magical, and perfect for underwater, fantasy, or surreal scenes.

name: Glowshift
description: The subject is surrounded by a soft, magical light as their form shifts into someone else. Smooth and mystical—perfect for illusions, disguises, or magical transformations.

name: Handheld
description: Mimics natural, shaky camera movement for a raw and realistic feel. Great for intense scenes, vlogs, or making viewers feel like they're in the moment.

name: Head Explosion
description: The subject’s head bursts in a dramatic blast of particles, fire, or surreal effects. Shocking, intense, and perfect for horror, dark comedy, or mind-blowing moments.

name: Head Off
description: The subject’s head detaches and floats or vanishes while the body remains standing. Surreal, eerie, or humorous—perfect for fantasy, glitch, or dreamlike visuals.

name: Head Tracking
description: Keeps the camera locked to the subject’s head movement, making the background shift while the face stays centered. Ideal for immersive, POV-like effects.

name: Hyperlapse
description: A moving timelapse where the camera travels through space over time, creating a fast, fluid journey. Perfect for dynamic cityscapes, travel scenes, or visual storytelling.

name: Incline
description: The subject moves or stands on a steep angle, as if the entire world is tilted. Creates tension, imbalance, or a surreal, gravity-defying visual effect.

name: Innerlight
description: A radiant glow builds from within the subject, shining through their skin and eyes. Feels spiritual, powerful, or magical—perfect for transformations, awakenings, or emotional peaks.

name: Invisible
description: The subject vanishes completely—no body, no clothing—leaving only their movement or impact behind. Feels ghostly, surreal, and perfect for sci-fi, stealth, or supernatural edits.

name: Jelly Drift
description: Three translucent glowing jellyfish float into the frame behind her, moving elegantly through the air. The woman interacts gently with the jellyfish.

name: Jib Down
description: The camera moves gently downward, focusing on the subject or revealing what's below. Perfect for dramatic entrances or scene reveals.

name: Jib Up
description: The camera lifts smoothly upward in a vertical motion, revealing more of the scene or emphasizing height. Great for epic intros or transitions.

name: Kiss
description: Captures the intimate moment of a kiss with soft focus, slow motion, or dramatic angles. Evokes emotion, romance, and connection between characters.

name: Lazy Susan
description: Rotates the camera smoothly around a still subject, like it's on a turntable. Great for stylish product shots or dramatic character reveals.

name: Lens Crack
description: Simulates a cracked camera lens with visible fractures and light distortion. Adds a raw, damaged, or chaotic feel—perfect for action, horror, or glitchy edits.

name: Lens Flare
description: Light hits the lens, creating bright streaks or spots. Adds a dreamy, cinematic, or dramatic feel to your shots

name: Levitation
description: The subject floats or rises smoothly off the ground, defying gravity. Creates a dreamy, magical, or surreal atmosphere perfect for fantasy or artistic visuals.

name: Low Shutter
description: Creates motion blur by lowering the shutter speed, giving your video a dreamy, streaky, or intense action look. Perfect for stylized or high-energy scenes.

name: Medusa Gorgona
description: The subject’s body slowly hardens and cracks as skin turns to cold, gray stone—freezing in place like a living statue. A dramatic, mythical transformation perfect for fantasy or curse effects.

name: Melting
description: The subject visibly softens and melts under intense heat—skin, clothes, or objects start to drip and distort. Evokes extreme temperature, tension, or surreal discomfort.

name: Moonwalk Left
description: The classic gliding move performed while moving left, with the body facing forward. Timeless, smooth, and packed with cool retro style.

name: Moonwalk Right
description: A smooth, gliding backward walk while facing forward, moving to the right. Iconic, stylish, and full of retro energy—perfect for dance or character flair.

name: Morphskin
description: The subject’s body morphs in real time—skin ripples, textures shift, and their form transforms into a new identity. Smooth, fluid, and perfect for shapeshifter or disguise effects.

name: Mouth In
description: Zooms swiftly into the character’s mouth for a fun, quirky, or surreal transition. Ideal for adding humor or exaggerating expressions.

name: Object POV
description: Shows the scene from the object’s point of view, making viewers feel like they're seeing through its "eyes." Great for immersive, creative storytelling.

name: Overhead
description: The camera is positioned above the subject, smoothly tracking their movement. Great for showing layout, movement, or creating a stylized, cinematic look.

name: Paint Splash
description: The object or subject transforms into a burst of liquid paint—splattering outward in colorful, fluid motion. Surreal and expressive, ideal for artistic transitions or dramatic visual effects.

name: Paparazzi
description: Flashes burst rapidly around the subject, simulating a crowd of cameras snapping photos. Glamorous, chaotic, or overwhelming—perfect for celebrity, fashion, or red carpet vibes.

name: Powder Explosion
description: A burst of colorful or dusty powder erupts around the subject, filling the frame with texture and motion. Perfect for dramatic entrances, dance shots, or high-impact visual flair.

name: Push To Glass
description: The subject is forcefully pushed against an invisible glass surface—face and body squash and distort on impact. Intense, dramatic, and perfect for adding tension or comedic exaggeration.

name: Rap Flex
description: Mimics iconic camera moves from rap music videos—smooth slides, low angles, and slow zooms. Perfect for giving your video a bold, confident, star-like vibe.

name: Robo Arm
description: Uses a high-speed robotic camera to create fast, precise, and cinematic movements. Ideal for smooth motion shots, product reveals, or dynamic transitions.

name: Roll Transition
description: The scene spins forward like a rolling wheel, smoothly transitioning from the start frame to the end frame. Clean, dynamic, and perfect for stylish edits or seamless scene changes.

name: Sand Storm
description: A powerful blast of sand sweeps through the scene, partially or fully engulfing the subject. Dust swirls, visibility drops—ideal for desert chaos, dramatic reveals, or elemental visuals.

name: Set on Fire
description: The subject bursts into flames in an instant, engulfed by intense fire. Dramatic and powerful—perfect for action scenes, supernatural moments, or explosive visuals.

name: Skateboard Glide
description: Smooth, flowing motion as the board rolls effortlessly. Relaxed and stylish, perfect for cruising scenes or aesthetic edits.

name: Skateboard Ollie
description: The classic jump where the rider and board lift off the ground without using hands. Clean, stylish, and the foundation of almost every trick.

name: Skate Cruise
description: Smooth, relaxed riding without tricks—just pushing and gliding through the streets. Feels calm, effortless, and stylish. Perfect for chill, aesthetic edits or street vibes.

name: Ski Carving
description: Shows a skier making clean, fast turns on the slope. Dynamic, smooth, and elegant—ideal for scenic mountain action.

name: Skin Surge
description: Objects like hands, flowers, or surreal forms emerge smoothly from the subject’s skin, as if breaking through a living surface. Organic, eerie, or poetic—perfect for fantasy, horror, or dreamlike visuals.

name: Ski Powder
description: Captures a skier cutting through deep snow with soft, explosive bursts. Dreamy and powerful, with a sense of freedom.

name: Snorricam
description: The movement captures the rhythm of the actor’s steps, creating a disorienting, visceral effect that emphasizes tension or distress’

name: Snowboard Carving
description: Highlights deep, controlled turns on a snowboard, with snow spraying out as the board slices the slope. Stylish and precise.

name: Snowboard Powder
description: Follows a snowboarder floating through fresh powder with wide turns and big sprays. Feels smooth, wild, and free.

name: Soul Jump
description: The subject’s soul visibly leaves the body—floating or leaping outward in a surreal, dreamlike motion. Perfect for magical, spiritual, or out-of-body visuals.

name: Static
description: The camera remains completely still, with no motion or shake. Clean, neutral, and steady—ideal for dialogue scenes or minimalist aesthetics.

name: Super 8MM
description: Grainy texture, soft flicker, and warm faded tones with light leaks and frame jitter. Evokes a nostalgic, dreamy mood like old home movies from the 60s–70s.

name: Super Dolly In
description: Smoothly moves the camera straight toward the subject for a focused, cinematic effect. Great for building tension, emotion, or spotlighting key moments.

name: Super Dolly Out
description: Smoothly pulls the camera away from the subject, revealing more of the scene. Perfect for dramatic exits, emotional distance, or scene transitions.

name: Tentacles
description: A surreal VFX effect where tentacles emerge from a person’s eyes, twisting and moving as if alive. Adds a creepy, otherworldly vibe perfect for horror or sci-fi scenes.

name: Through Object In
description: Moves the camera inward through an object to focus on the subject behind it. Perfect for creative reveals and smooth, immersive transitions.

name: Through Object Out
description: Moves the camera outward through an object, revealing the scene behind it. Creates a smooth, creative transition and adds depth to your storytelling.

name: Thunder God
description: Eyes glow with intense, electric energy while lightning flickers around the subject. Evokes divine power, rage, or transformation—perfect for epic, supernatural moments.

name: Tilt Down
description: Rotates the camera angle downward, revealing what’s below or shifting focus. Great for dramatic reveals, transitions, or guiding the viewer’s eye.

name: Tilt up
description: Moves the camera upward to reveal something or make the subject feel powerful, grand, or important

name: Timelapse Human
description: Speeds up human motion while the environment stays natural, showing quick movements like walking, dressing, or dancing. Adds energy, urgency, or a surreal, fast-forwarded feel.

name: Timelapse Landscape
description: Captures the rapid movement of natural elements like clouds, sunlight, or crowds over time. Creates a majestic, dreamlike view of changing landscapes and passing moments.

name: Turning Metal
description: The subject’s skin and body slowly transform into reflective, metallic surfaces—like silver, gold, or chrome. Feels powerful, surreal, and perfect for sci-fi or high-fashion edits.

name: VHS
description: Faded colors, static noise, scan lines, and tracking glitches with a soft blur. Feels like a worn-out 80s–90s videotape, raw and nostalgic.

name: Whip Pan
description: A fast camera pan that blurs the scene, used to transition between shots or add energy and speed. Great for action, comedy, or sudden scene changes.

name: Wiggle
description: Combines slight shaky “wiggle” motion with a smooth zoom or pan to reveal the subject. Adds playful energy and keeps the shot dynamic and engaging, perfect for stylish intros or creative reveals.

name: Wind to Face
description: Intense wind blasts the subject with extreme force—hair whips, clothes thrash, and the body leans into the pressure. Creates a dramatic, chaotic, or high-impact visual moment.

name: YoYo Zoom
description: A rapid in-and-out zoom motion that mimics the snap of a yoyo—fast, playful, and punchy. Adds energy, tension, or comic effect to your scene.

name: Zoom In
description: Gradually moves closer to the subject, building focus, tension, or emotional intensity

name: Zoom Out
description: Gradually pulls back to reveal more of the scene, creating distance, suspense, or a sense of isolation
